document_info.title: Default Alice in Wonderland Test Questions
document_info.description: Default test questions for RAG evaluation

questions.question: Who is the main character in Alice in Wonderland?
questions.reference: The main character in Alice in Wonderland is Alice, a young girl who falls down a rabbit hole into a fantasy world.

questions.question: What happens to Alice at the beginning of the story?
questions.reference: At the beginning of the story, Alice falls down a rabbit hole while chasing a white rabbit.

questions.question: Who does Alice follow down the rabbit hole?
questions.reference: Alice follows a white rabbit down the rabbit hole.

questions.question: What kind of world does Alice discover?
questions.reference: Alice discovers a fantasy world full of peculiar anthropomorphic creatures.

questions.question: What is the setting of Alice in Wonderland?
questions.reference: The setting is a fantasy world called Wonderland, which Alice reaches by falling down a rabbit hole.
